AbsorbEndCombat.NAME: Heart of Goo
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, for each Spawned slime, heal #b3 HP.

AbsorbEndCombatUpgraded.NAME: Black Heart of Goo
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #gHeart #gof #gGoo. Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL At the end of combat, for each Spawned slime, heal #b1 HP.

SlimedTailRelic.NAME: Slimed Tail
SlimedTailRelic.FLAVOR: A fake tail to trick enemies during combat, completely covered in slime.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you fall below 50% of your Maximum HP, spawn two Poisoning Slimes who will block up to 2 attacks made to you this turn (works once per combat).

PotencyRelic.NAME: Ooze Stone
PotencyRelic.FLAVOR: It is said to gain power based on your mood.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, spawn a Sliming Slime and gain #b1 Potency.

PreparedRelic.NAME: Slimed Tea Set
PreparedRelic.FLAVOR: Definitely not the key to a refreshing night's rest.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you Rest, begin the next combat with a Prepare card that costs 0 for your first turn.

StudyCardRelic.NAME: Tiny Bowler Hat
StudyCardRelic.FLAVOR: Whosoever controls the hat, controls the world.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a Study the Spire card to your hand.

AggressiveSlimeRelic.NAME: My Own Minion
AggressiveSlimeRelic.FLAVOR: He followed me home. Can I keep it?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, spawn an Attacking slime.

MaxSlimesRelic.NAME: Slime Plushie
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, spawn a Weakening slime and gain 1 Slime slot.
